errorCodeList.solution: Tell the user to log in to their existing account, or provide a link to the 'forgot password' procedure.
Provide a valid user identifier, a unique identifier string for the user account that is not already in use.
Your password should be at least 8 characters in length.
Provide a valid email verification code.
Tell the user to provide valid authentication details, or inform them about the 'forgot password' functionality.

errorCodeList.message: A general error has occurred. Please contact our support team.
